snippet: With the County Sheriff’s Department enmeshed in new allegations of civil rights violations and falsified reports, its leader, Lee Baca, faces renewed calls for his resignation.
abstract: Los Angeles County Sheriff's Department is enmeshed in new allegations of civil rights violations, years after corruption and abuse charges that followed Rodney King beating and ensuing turnarond; Sheriff Lee Baca, whose re-election was once considered assured, is facing calls for his resignation.
lead_paragraph: With the County Sheriff’s Department enmeshed in new allegations of civil rights violations and falsified reports, its leader, Lee Baca, faces renewed calls for his resignation.

headline.main: Arrests Challenge Los Angeles County Sheriff’s 4-Term Tenure
headline.print_headline: Arrests Challenge Los Angeles County Sheriff’s 4-Term Tenure
